press \C[6]Space\C[0] to use a melee weapon.
No need to worry about running out of ammo,

This is the advantage of melee weapons.

In addition, since stamina is consumed when
attacking, it is very risky to use it against
targets that have the ability to resist.
To switch from a melee weapon back to a gun,\!
